definition: to throw/to cast/left-slanting downward brush stroke (calligraphy)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Whether or not those desires can be satisfied is set aside.
sentences.chinese: 此類慾望是否能得到滿足，我們暫且撇開不談。

sentences.english: Put aside this question for a moment.
